node.title: This Testimony
node.description: The Bible is replete with examples of men and women who served God in remarkable ways, but there is one life that deserves special attention. As we reflect on this life, we will find that it is possible for us to draw warmth from the coldness of others, and courage from their cowardice. If we want to lift Jesus up in a world that desires nothing more than to put Him down, then this is a study that is not only valuable—it is necessary.
